ingredients.ingredient: 1 (18.25 ounce) package brownie mix (such as Betty Crocker®)
20 chocolate mint layer candies (such as Andes®), or more as needed, unwrapped

cookingTips: Follow brownie mix instructions precisely for best texture and moisture level
Press chocolate mint candies into brownie batter before baking so they distribute throughout and soften slightly
Bake until just set with a slight wobble in center; cool completely before cutting for clean edges
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook create a simple yet indulgent chocolate-mint brownie using convenient mix and candy layers. Emphasize candy placement for even distribution.
